text: Ndipo iye adati, “E inu ana anga! Musakalowere khomo limodzi koma kaloweni m’makomo osiyanasiyana ndipo ine sindingakuthandizeni chilichonse polimbana ndi Mulungu. Zoonadi chiweruzo ndi cha Mulungu yekha. Mwa Iye yekha ine ndimaika chikhulupiriro changa ndipo onse amene amakhulupirira aike chikhulupiriro chawo mwa Iye.”
